devdoc.author: Ryan Davies

addBoat(string,string,uint256,uint256).details: The caller must have the club owner role and have a club

params.description: details about the boat for sale
params.name: name or title of the boat

addBoat(string,string,uint256,uint256).return: boatIdSeq of the new boat added

addClub(string,string).details: The called must have been granted the club owner role

params.name: name of the rowing boat club

params._address: the address to receive the club owner role
the address to be granted the market admin role

closeClub(uint256).details: May only be called by the owner of the given club

params.clubId: ID of the club to be closed

constructor.details: assign the owner the market admin role by default

getBoat(uint256).return: name of the boatdecription of the boatprice of the boat in Weiquantity of the boat in stockboatStatus of the boat, enum BoatStatus

params.clubId: ID of club which owns the returned boat ID

getClub(uint256).return: address of the club ownername of the clublocation of the clubstatus of the rowing club, enum ClubStatus

getClubIds().return: an array of boat club IDs

getClubOwners().return: the arrary of Club Owner addresses

getMarketAdmins().return: the array of Market Admin addresses

getMyBalance().return: the balance in Wei as an integer

openClub(uint256).details: May only be called by the owner of the given club

params.clubId: ID of the club to be opened

purchaseBoat(uint256,uint256).details: The function uses SafeMath for calculations to prevent against underflowand overflow errors or attacks. The function uses the modifier nonReentrant provided by OpenZeppelin, to prevent against reentrancy attacks.

params.quantity: number of the boat to purcahse

purchaseBoat(uint256,uint256).return: purchaseIdSeq, the ID of the purchase recorded in the purcahses mapping

removeBoat(uint256).details: The caller must be the owner of the given boat ID

params.boatId: ID of the boat to be marked as Removed

removeClub(uint256).details: May only be called by the owner of the given club

params.clubId: ID of the club to be removed

params._address: the address of the club owner

toggleBoatStatus(uint256).details: The caller must be the owner of the given boat ID

withdrawFunds().details: The function uses the nonReentrant modifier to prevent againstreentrancy attacks. nonReentrant is provided ReentrancyGuard developed by OpenZeppelin.The function is also written using the withdrawl design pattern.

devdoc.title: A market for rowing boat clubs on the river Thames to sell rowing boats

addBoat(string,string,uint256,uint256).notice: Add boat details, mapped to the callers club ID

addClubOwner(address).notice: Add the club owner role to a given address

addMarketAdmin(address).notice: Add the market admin role to the given address

closeClub(uint256).notice: Mark the given club as Closed

getBoat(uint256).notice: Returns the details of a given boat ID

getBoatsIdbyClubId(uint256).notice: Gets the boat IDs owned by a given club ID

getClub(uint256).notice: Returns the details for a given club ID

getClubIds().notice: Gets the complete list of club IDs

getClubOwners().notice: Gets the array of Club Owner addresses ever assigned

getMarketAdmins().notice: Gets the array of Market Admins addresses every assigned

getMyBalance().notice: Gets the balance of the requesting address from the balances mapping

openClub(uint256).notice: Mark the given club as Open

purchaseBoat(uint256,uint256).notice: Purchase a given boat specifing the boat ID and quantity

removeBoat(uint256).notice: Remove a boat by given boat ID

removeClub(uint256).notice: Mark the given club as Removed, and therefore permanently closed

removeClubOwner(address).notice: Remove the club owner role from a given address

removeMarketAdmin(address).notice: Remove the market admin role from the given address

toggleBoatStatus(uint256).notice: Toggles the state of a given boat ID between ForSale and NotForSale

withdrawFunds().notice: Withdraw funds recorded in balances for the callers account
